coded_answer.p: I am writing to thank you for noticingnotifying me about the competition and I would be very grateful in givingto give to you the information that was requieredrequiredrequested in your letter.
I regret to inform you that I have had some problems in my full-time sales assistant job so, I would rather travel only in July than other months.

About the Accommodation, I would like you to take careful consideration of the fact that I am ashmaticasthmatic so,,so I would appreciatteappreciate it if you could reserve a bed in a log cabinslog cabin.

Your letter also mentioned some kind of activities in which we can involveget involved throughduring the campingcamp. I would like to choose painting and photography which are my favouritesfavourite ones. I have recently finished a three yearthree-year course ofin painting and I always behave always been fascinated by the photography.

On the other hand, I would also like to know some aboutabout some further details like wetherwhether we need to bring wewith us some clothessome clothes with us or whether itthey will be provided tofor us and if we need some money in case we have to affordbuy something.
I hope to see you soon.

Hi. How do you doHow are you? You may be asking why I haven't written to you before. Well, I've been very busy, you know. Two weeks ago I enrolled in a group to help on building a stage for a concert ofto be given by a famous singer star.
ActivitiesThe activities lastinglasted almost 2 days and a halfand a half days.

The first day we havehad to movego to the airport to bring all the equipment by lorrieslorry to the camp. It was really awful and hard. I finished the day tooextremely tired. However, the second day was less heavierheavy than the first one. We just worked inon building the stage and all thosethat sort of thing. Putting the instrumentinstruments in the right place, testing all the microphonemicrophones as well as the sound was the rest of the job.
At the end I must confess that it was really amazing hang up and down all the equipment, which varied from small microphonemicrophones to a marvellous huge large black screen of TVTV screen.
If you hadhave this oportunittyopportunity one day, you had better buy the ticket to the concert or just watch it on TV but never do something like this just to get a free pass.
My regards to your family. Write to me soon.
